document_data.name: Three Torn Towers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Three Torn Towers''' was a trio of gate towers of the fortress-city [[Ascalhorn]], later known as [[Hellgate Keep]]. They were one of three sites that remained of the fortress following its destruction in [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Location: These towers stood along the ramp leading up to Hellgate Keep, being the most easy way to access the ruined fortress.

Structure.Interior: The southernmost of the Three Torn Towers had hidden behind rubble a crawlspace leading to a hidden spiral stairwell,

document_data.Inhabitants: The [[treant]] forces of [[Turlang]] stood outside around the Three Torn Towers following Hellgate Keep's destruction, guarding against those who would seek to plunder the [[evil]] that laid inside the ruins.
